name: HIRED FUN
description:
STORY

In "Hired Fun," you play as Tony, a clown who has lost his job at the circus. To regain his position, he must prove that he's funny enough to make the audience laugh. His colleague Danny gives him the chance to get his job back if he helps everyone in the town and surrounding areas by making them laugh.

As you wander around, you'll encounter a variety of characters, each with their own unique problems. Your task is to support them and solve their challenges by using your clowning skills in a humorous way. You'll need to make decisions that have an impact on the storyline, carefully considering which choices are best.

GENRE

"Hired Fun" is a point-and-click adventure game where you navigate the game world by clicking on objects and characters and interacting with them to advance the story. You'll need to collect clues to solve puzzles and unlock new areas.

Experience an entertaining point-and-click adventure with "Hired Fun" and help Tony regain his place in the circus!
